entry.title: flick9000/winscript
entry.summary:
Open-source tool to build your Windows 10/11 script from scratch. It includes debloat, privacy, performance & app installing scripts.

WinScript

WinScript is an open-source tool built to help you build custom scripts for Windows 10 and 11. It includes debloat, privacy, performance scripts & more, along with the ability to install all your favourite apps in one click.

Features

  • ğŸ§¹ Debloat: Remove Windows bloatware, CoPilot, Edge, OneDrive & pre-installed features.
  • ğŸ” Privacy: Disable Windows and 3rd party telemetry & data collection, tracking, app access & more.
  • ğŸš€ Performance: Set background services to manual to free resources, set your preferred DNS, clean temp files & more.
  • â¬‡ï¸ Install Apps: Install all your favourite apps simultaneously in one click through chocolatey.

Usage

WinScript must be run as Administrator to function properly.
The desktop app may be flagged as a threat by Windows Defender due to its ability to modify system settings. This is a false positiveâ€”WinScript is safe, transparent, and open-source.

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Launch Command:

irm "https://winscript.cc/irm" | iex

ğŸ–¥ï¸ Via Winget:

winget install winscript

ğŸ“¦ Portable App: Latest Release

ğŸŒ Online Version: Website Link

Support

â­ Star

Feel free to leave a star and help the project reach more people!

ğŸ‘· Contributing

Contributions are welcome! Fork the repository and create a pull request with your changes.

  1. Fork the repository
  2. Create your feature branch
  3. Commit your changes
  4. Push to the branch
  5. Create a new Pull Request

If you find this project helpful, consider supporting it by buying me a coffee!
